sentences.sContent: The firm has not been able to pare costs fast enough to match competitors.
sentences.sCn: 那家公司一直没能迅速削减开支，难以与对手抗衡。

sentences.sContent: The country’s defences have been pared to the bone (= reduced as far as possible ) .
sentences.sCn: 该国的防御能力已被削减至最低水平。

trans.tranOther: to reduce the amount, number, or size of something as much as you can
